    Interface IRepository<T>

    Represents a generic repository for data access operations.

    Namespace: Innovt.Domain.Core.Repository
    Assembly: Innovt.Domain.Core.dll
    Syntax
    public interface IRepository<T> where T : class
    Type Parameters
    Name Description
    T

    The entity type.
